snippet: Indexes declined, extending losses from a day earlier as discouraging economic reports on manufacturing, jobs and construction spending stoked investor concerns.
abstract: Discouraging economic news pulls major United States stock indexes down for second day in a row.
lead_paragraph: Indexes declined, extending losses from a day earlier as discouraging economic reports on manufacturing, jobs and construction spending stoked investor concerns.

headline.main: Weak Economic Reports Lead Market to Second Day of Losses
headline.print_headline: Worries on Earnings Send Shares Down for a 2nd Day
